transcript: I don't know why it is, but every time I reach out for something that I want, I have to pull back because I might hurt somebody else. My whole bloody life time after time after time.

segments.text: I don't know why it is, but every time I reach out for something that I want, I have to pull back because I might hurt somebody else.
My whole bloody life time after time after time.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't know why it is but everytime I reach out for something I- that I want, I have to pull back because I might hurt somebody else.  My whole bloody life; time after time after time.
